text: Nemanja Tekijaški (; born 2 March 1997) is a Serbian football defender who plays for Spartak Subotica. ==Club career== ===Železničar Pančevo=== Tekijaški came through Dinamo Pančevo youth system and was a part of the club's academy until summer 2014. On 8 August, same year, he joined the local club Železničar, who appeared in the Banat Zone League. After the club won the competition, and promoted to the Serbian League Vojvodina, Tekijaški took a place in the first squad for the 2015–16 campaign. During the season, he made 24 league matches, scoring a single goal for the club. Similar to the previous season, Tekijaški scored once time on 27 matches in the 2016–17 campaign. For the rest of 2017, Tekijaški played with the club in the first half of the 2017–18 season, scoring two goals in victories over Dunav Stari Banovci and Radnički Sremska Mitrovica, when he was also elected for the man of the match. ===Spartak Subotica=== Tekijaški joined Spartak Subotica at the beginning of 2018, after which he signed a -year deal with the club on 17 January same year. Tekijaški made his Serbian SuperLiga debut for new club on 16 February 2018, replacing injured Nemanja Ćalasan in 41 minute of the match against Napredak Kruševac. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;font-size:90%" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Železničar Pančevo |2015–16 |rowspan=3|League Vojvodina ||24||1||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||24||1 |- |2016–17 ||27||1||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||27||1 |- |2017–18 ||13||2||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||2||0||15||2 |- !colspan="2"| Total !64!!4!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!2!!0!!66!!4 |- |rowspan="3" valign="center"|Spartak Subotica |2017–18 |rowspan="2" valign="center"|SuperLiga ||9||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||9||0 |- |2018–19 ||16||0||0||0||4||0||colspan="2"|—||20||0 |- !colspan="2"| Total !25!!0!!0!!0!!4!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!29!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !89!!4!!0!!0!!4!!0!!2!!0!!95!!4 |} ==Personal life== Born in Pančevo, Tekijaški finished Gymnasium in his home town. Beside the football career, he is a student at the University of Belgrade Faculty of Law. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Pančevo Category:Association football central defenders Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Spartak Subotica players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players Category:FK Železničar Pančevo players
